fields.name: Osip Mineral Water
fields.description: Natural mineral water sourced from pristine springs, rich in essential minerals for optimal hydration. Crisp, clean taste with a perfect balance of electrolytes—great for health and vitality.

fields.name: Mango Juice
fields.description: Sweet, tropical mango goodness in every sip! Made from ripe, juicy mangoes for a refreshing, vitamin-packed drink. Perfect for summer days!

fields.name: Apple Juice
fields.description: 100% pure apple juice—naturally sweet with no added sugar. A healthy, energizing drink full of antioxidants and freshness.

fields.name: Lychee Juice
fields.description: Delicate, floral lychee flavor with a hint of sweetness. Packed with vitamin C for a hydrating, exotic treat.

fields.name: Triangle
fields.description: Golden, crispy triangles—lightly seasoned for a satisfying crunch. Ideal with dips or solo!

fields.name: Slanty
fields.description: Irresistibly crunchy and lightly salted. The perfect savory snack for movie nights or on-the-go munching.

fields.name: Lemon Kurkure
fields.description: Tangy lemon and spicy kick in every crunchy bite. A bold snack for flavor adventurers!
